comment._content:
Once more the eagerly awaited and truly appreciated Golden Age content, this time extensive and varied. 
Thanks a lot people at SDASM for share the delights of those magnificent designs.
Such a refreshing, evocative, and uplifting sight.

comment._content:
This is in fact the prototype Fokker F.VIIa after arrival in USA. The Engine is a Packard Liberty.
